SEARCH
Package org.example

Class DBManager

java.lang.Object
org.example.DBManager
public class DBManager extends Object
The DBManager class is the main controller to interact with the database. It connects to the database through the singleton class DbController. It has all the CRUD methods for the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DBManager()
    The constructor of the class calls the database's initialization method initializeDB() and connects to the instance of DbController singleton class.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBManager

      public DBManager()
      The constructor of the class calls the database's initialization method initializeDB() and connects to the instance of DbController singleton class.

  • Method Details

    • findRoomByType

      public List<Room> findRoomByType(String roomType)
      Finds all the rooms that have the same type as the input.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of the rooms to look for.
      Returns:
      a list of rooms that match the roomType

    • updateRoom

      public String updateRoom(int roomNum, double price, String isAvailable)
      Updates a room record based on the roomNumber (pk).
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the primary key of the room.
      price - the price per night.
      isAvailable - represents a boolean "True" or "False" for the availability of the room.
      Returns:
      an empty string if the update was successful, or a string of the error that occurred if the operation fails.

    • deleteRow

      public void deleteRow(String table, String pkColumn, int pkValue)
      Deletes a row from a table using the primary key. Make sure the primary key is the first column of every table, and it's an integer.
      Parameters:
      table - name of the table of the row to be deleted
      pkValue - the value of the primary key or ID of the row

    • insertClientRecord

      public boolean insertClientRecord(String name, String contact, int numOfMembers, String isInHotel)
      Inserts a row to the client table
      Parameters:
      name - name of the client
      contact - contact of the client
      numOfMembers - number of members with the client

    • insertRoomRecord

      public boolean insertRoomRecord(int roomNum, String roomType, double price, String isAvailable)
      Inserts a room row in the rooms table.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the primary key of the record
      roomType - the type of room
      price - the price per night
      isAvailable - represents a boolean "True" or "False" for the availability of the room.
      Returns:
      true if the insert was successful.

    • insertBookingRecord

      public String insertBookingRecord(int clientId, int roomNum, LocalDate startDate)
      Adds a booking record to the database.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The id of the client that is booking the room.
      roomNum - The room number for the booking.
      startDate - The starting date of the booking.
      Returns:
      an empty string if the insert was successful, or a string of the error that occurred if the operation fails.

    • completeBooking

      public String completeBooking(int bookingNum)
      Completes a booking to check out a client. The booking record is updated to today's date that marks the end of the booking. If the booking ends before it starts, that means the client is canceling the booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingNum - the primary key of the booking record
      Returns:
      an empty string if the operation was successful, or a string of the error that occurred if the operation fails.

    • dropTable

      public void dropTable(String tableName)
      Drops a table from the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table to remove.

    • selectAvailableRooms

      public List<Room> selectAvailableRooms()
      Selects all the rooms that are marked as available in the database.
      Returns:
      the list of available rooms.

    • selectCurrentClients

      public List<Client> selectCurrentClients()
      Selects all clients that are currently in the hotel
      Returns:
      the list of all clients in the hotel.

    • findClient

      public Client findClient(int id)
      Finds a client
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the client to look for.
      Returns:
      the found client. If it's not found, then null is returned.

    • findRoom

      public Room findRoom(int roomNum)
      Finds a room in the database that matches the input room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the number of the room to find.
      Returns:
      the room if it is found, or null if it is not found.

    • selectJsonRooms

      public List<Room> selectJsonRooms()
      Selects all the rooms in the database using json object.
      Returns:
      the list of room records in the database.

    • selectJsonBookings

      public List<Booking> selectJsonBookings()
      Selects all the bookings in the database using json object.
      Returns:
      the list of booking records in the database.

    • selectJsonClients

      public List<Client> selectJsonClients()
      Selects all the clients in the database using json object.
      Returns:
      the list of client records in the database.

    • findRoomLowToHighPrice

      public List<Room> findRoomLowToHighPrice()
      Selects all the rooms in the database based on the price, from low to high.
      Returns:
      the list of sorted room records in the database.
